pull.title: qt: Reset toolbar after all wallets are closed
pull.body:
If the last open wallet is closed from the non-"Overview" tab, that tab remains active when a new wallet is opened:

![Screenshot from 2020-05-06 09-00-26](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/81142394-46821880-8f78-11ea-84b5-1d02f2b7f3f1.png)

This PR fixes this bug.

events.body:
~~No strong opinion.~~
Concept ACK, it fixes the bug when a wallet is opened after closing the last one where the current page isn't overview.

events.body: Reopened to update Travis CI build list.

comments.body: I'd avoid using `gui`, it should be unknown to `WalletFrame` - actually I have a branch to remove `gui` here. May I suggest to do this in `BitcoinGUI::removeWallet`, in `m_wallet_selector->count() == 0` condition.
